website_summaries.verdict: Other extension grabbers only "pinch" objects with their jaw tips, but this contender will wrap securely around food cans, glass bottles and other round items.
pros: Works well as a dressing aid
cons: Some larger objects difficult to pick up
Jaws do not lock in place

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a store run
customer_reviews.text: Being in a wheelchair I've always had a problem with items on the higher shelves. The usual reacher/grabbers are too long and weak to handle the heavy grocery items and are to cumbersome to carry to the store in the first place. This one is the perfect size and strength for my purpose. I'll never go on another store run without it again! My only complaint would be that the box it came in was long enough to hold two of these end to end with room to spare. Needlessly oversized packaging!
customer_reviews.author: William Whalen

customer_reviews.title: Good for shorties with deep washers
customer_reviews.text: Like others, I needed this for reaching into the top-load washer and back of the dryer. I'm 5'1" and so are my mother and MIL, so all 3 of us are now using this short grabber for that reason! The shorter size is gives you better control and leverage. I can easily grab several items from the back of the drum at once. I also find it's better for day to day things that I used to use the full-length grabber for.
customer_reviews.author: Pittsburgh Jill

customer_reviews.title: Best Grabber of All!
customer_reviews.text: Best grabber ever! And I've bought them all. It's so good you could pick up a strand of hair off a tile floor! It truly pinches together, better than fingertips. And it's just the right length...handier than a long one. You can grab a throw from the end of the couch, pick up anything you dropped, and pluck a piece of paper or a bottle of water off the floor. It's like having a weirdly long arm! IDEA FOR IMPROVEMENT; a cutout in the handle to loop a cord thru, so it could hang off my walker. Or on a hook.. I ended up tying something around the handle, which isn't as nice, but works. Great product, otherwise!
customer_reviews.author: Chamberpaint

customer_reviews.title: Good design and made well.
customer_reviews.text: I use a walker and find it difficult to pick things off floor. Have tried many different brands, but this grabber has proven to be the most effective at picking up small items off the floor. It is lightweight, sturdy enough to pick up medium-size objects and effective at picking up paper and other small objects on the floor.. It is also proven to be the most reliable. Furthermore I have put a cane holder on my walker to hold this grabber. It is now with me wherever I go.
customer_reviews.author: BillyBob

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: This is what is the most useful length for putting on clothing or rretrieving items that are close to you. Moreover, the 19 inch grabber is excellent for use in a shower to pick up dropped shampoo, bars of soap, wash clothes or even to pull back a shower curtain. Unless you have the arms of a gorilla a long grabber, 26" or more it is just about impossible to get an item into your hand if it is at the end of a long grabber.
customer_reviews.author: Juju

customer_reviews.title: Excellent grabber!
customer_reviews.text: It's lightweight, with an easy to use handle, and long enough for picking up things from the floor without bending over very much (not allowed after hip surgery) -- I admit that I'm fairly short. I picked up 24 oz bottles of juice,, books, clothing, pens, and tiny bits of trash, including a plastic dental pick, which is smaller in diameter than a toothpick, and pieces of dried grass. Don't know how long it will last, but for sure long enough to get me through my recovery. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: LPG

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and very helpful
customer_reviews.text: I like these. They aren't really long, like some others, and that's why I bought them. It just depends on what you're planning to do with them. I keep one by the washing machine (to grab small items like socks from the very bottom of the washer or the very back of the dryer), and I keep the other in my car to take in to the grocery store (so I can reach items on the top shelf with ease).
customer_reviews.author: D. J. Nolte

customer_reviews.title: Arrived quickly!
customer_reviews.text: The grabber worked well as far as its intended purpose. It seemed very sturdy, however, I found that the grabber did not grab something very small as tightly as one I had previously owned from another company. I returned it and order the one I previously had. If the grabber part would have been stronger, I would have kept it.
customer_reviews.author: Pingy

customer_reviews.title: Great helper
customer_reviews.text: Just had this product for a week and haven't had to use it much but it is a great help. I've had the other kind before. I replaced it plus added this new one with the different Grabbers at the end and I liked it for getting cans out of the cabinet and larger objects. I actually bought it to get mail and packages out of a large mailbox at the curb from the car. Works like a charm I would definitely recommend it to anyone that needs the short arm help
customer_reviews.author: Lou Ann

customer_reviews.title: Great until it broke 2 days later!
customer_reviews.text: This lasted all of 2 days.. it was great until it broke. Still cant figure out why it doesnt work anymore. Haha! The trigger just stopped working. It also appears like you're gonna be able to retract it out longer but nope you can't.
customer_reviews.author: Dreamydoodles

customer_reviews.title: Needs to be stronger
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to take laundry out of my deep he wash machine, but it doesn't do very well with jeans or anything very heavy. I had to go back to my old kitchen tongs to lift jeans and heavy laundry items! It is ok for lightweight laundry but I am not impressed with it.
customer_reviews.author: Tuxedo Cat

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this grabber
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this grabber. Just the right length to "carry" with me on my wheeled walker and pick up most items with minimal bending. AND it picked up my cell phone that none of the other grabbers does.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Wallet

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I am short and my washing machine is deep. I use it to retrieve items from the bottom of the tub. It is sturdy and effective it has saved me from frustration and bruising to my ribs (when I had to jump and lean to reach wet laundry).
customer_reviews.author: katyj

customer_reviews.title: Great while it lasts.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great short reacher tool that my Dad requested because it lets him pick up stuff he drops, but is short enough to bring out on his walker without getting in the way. Unfortunately, the cable already broke on the one I ordered in March, so this is a replacement. Wish cable was sturdier.
customer_reviews.author: Judy L

customer_reviews.title: It was just what we needed.
customer_reviews.text: There is not too much to say about this nice little grabber it makes it easy to use when I drive next to my mailbox in my PU truck I can reach out and get the mail out. And yes I am on the wrong sis of the street, a dead end road and only 8 houses.
customer_reviews.author: dow man

customer_reviews.title: With in 3 months it broke
customer_reviews.text: I am 85 year old and I use this item because of it's size and ease of use. Last night the wire for the lever snapped. Very disappointed. Its the perfect size and weight, but I can not count on it to work no more than 3 months. I cannot afford to do that.
customer_reviews.author: Charles J Wezenski

customer_reviews.title: Great grabber
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for picking up even small items. When my mother broke her hip she couldn't reach papers, pills, etc., that fell to the floor. This short grabber was perfect for picking up even those small items. An excellent buy.
customer_reviews.author: auntboo

customer_reviews.title: Useful & well built.  :)
customer_reviews.text: I got two of them. I keep one with the washer & dryer for my wife. She's short and has problems reaching stuff at the bottom / back. I keep another one in my truck. It's great for drive through / pick up windows that can't be reached because your sitting to high up.
customer_reviews.author: Mister Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect length, strong jaws
customer_reviews.text: Bought a longer one originally but this shorter length one works better for my deep compartment washer and dryer. Now I don't have to climb in anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Serna

customer_reviews.title: Great size for use from a wheelchair.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent size, not too long for someone to use from a wheelchair, and works well for picking up items from the floor or near distances. The longer tools have their place, but can be difficult to maneuver while seated. The gripping surface is soft and pliable, and the head rotates.
customer_reviews.author: Office Rat

customer_reviews.title: Grabber pick up tool
customer_reviews.text: It is okay. I have others I like better. I bought it for the smaller size. I keep them near me but wish this one had a hook to hang it up near me.
customer_reviews.author: Camille Albert

customer_reviews.title: Great smaller grabber.
customer_reviews.text: I am disabled and confined to a wheelchair. I have a longer grabber which is too long for picking up something I drop. This is the perfect size and is very sturdy and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: not the best
customer_reviews.text: I needed grabbers for the recovery period after spinal surgery. This particular grabber wasn't very strong and it was hard to grasp and lift. It could not pick up anything small either.
customer_reviews.author: S. Forrest

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!! I ORDERED 2 FROM HSN
customer_reviews.text: PERFECT!! I ORDERED 2 FROM HSN, FANCY LONG, WITH LIGHT, THEY WERE TO LONG, THEY WERE WEAK AND BOTH SNAPPED IN HALF. I THREW THEM BOTH AWAY. THE SHORTER GRABBER IS THE BEST!! LOVE IT!! WILL BE ORDERING AGAIN FOR DIFFERENT ROOMS.
customer_reviews.author: sue carse

customer_reviews.title: It is short.
customer_reviews.text: Good product if you like shorty's. My fault that I didn't read far enough. It would be a great product If it was 12 inches longer. Wayne.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Wright

customer_reviews.title: Great Grabber
customer_reviews.text: I bought this grabber to remove clothes from my top loading washer. I looked at lots of grabbers but this one had more rubber grips. I didn’t want to damage the clothes. This grabber is the perfect length for my needs. It works great even on towels.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Reliability
customer_reviews.text: One of the best short "grabbers" I've owned. It makes grabbing from my hospital table easy.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: just the right size for picking things up without having out of my chair.
customer_reviews.author: Randall Whaley

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: This is not bad for the money works great on small to medium objects.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Montanarello

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Shorter Grabber
customer_reviews.text: Great short grabber to use when longers one won’t do the job!?.. Light, sturdy, and easy to use when putting on my slippers or socks. Worthy purchase.
customer_reviews.author: S B

customer_reviews.title: Item broke already
customer_reviews.text: The grabber already broke. My mom has only used it for two months since her back surgery. Will Amazon send a replacement?
customer_reviews.author: Desiree Morris

customer_reviews.title: A perfect laundry aid.
customer_reviews.text: A perfect length for removing clothes from the bottom of the washing machine or back of the dryer. If your back won't let you bend a must have tool.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Luikart

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT SIZE FOR MY NEEDS
customer_reviews.text: The smaller size perfectly satisfies my needs. It is fairly well built; I've had it now for two or three months and use it daily. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: LakeArcher

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I have two of these and could use one in every room of the house. If you have a sore or arthritic arm or back, this is a lifesaver.
customer_reviews.author: Howdy_2u

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This shorter version of the grabber is much better than the long 30+ inch grabber. It allows greater control and is not cumbersome to use.
customer_reviews.author: John P.

customer_reviews.title: LENGTH
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize how short it was. I needed a longer pick up.
customer_reviews.author: lexie1946

customer_reviews.title: lightweight,easy to operate, and good price
customer_reviews.text: The Grabber is light weight, and the handle is very smooth to operate. I have 2 health issues where my mobility is very, very limited. It works great where a longer grabber is just to long. excellent for in the kitchen, for reaching second shelf in the cabinets
customer_reviews.author: Wade Helke

customer_reviews.title: Great light grabber
customer_reviews.text: This is great for me. Right size and weight. Was able to pick up something very small on floor and grab things in refrigerator.
customer_reviews.author: P. Kar

customer_reviews.title: just love it, Its much better then the old one ...
customer_reviews.text: Received early, just love it, Its much better then the old one I had. It grips the smallest things on the floor. Will order again. Thanks for offering it and making it available on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Judith

customer_reviews.title: So Helpful
customer_reviews.text: This grabber is just the perfect size and so helpful in saving me back pain when picking small things up off the floor. It will pick up a bobby pen. I really like it and it is light enough for us that have joint pain in our fingers or wrist.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

customer_reviews.title: Grabber
customer_reviews.text: This is a life saver for someone who is immobile or can't bend over....and of course for other ways to use it. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Bowen

customer_reviews.title: Good Grip and easy to handle.
customer_reviews.text: Strong grip. Perfect size for picking up things around my recliner.
customer_reviews.author: R. Perdue

customer_reviews.title: What's not to like! Prefect!
customer_reviews.text: This little tool is a life saver after hip surgery. Long enough to pick things up off the floor.. Short enough to help with dressing.
customer_reviews.author: sherry allen

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy enough
customer_reviews.text: They are flimsy and do not grip things that you have to pull down like shades etc.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis Joan

customer_reviews.title: Very Handy
customer_reviews.text: This is really great and handy. It's easy to use when you are sitting down. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Toot Sing

customer_reviews.title: Great grabber
customer_reviews.text: This grabber was the right length for me to use to pick up things while sitting on an electric scooter. Wish I bought one years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

customer_reviews.title: With this bad boy I can easily reach everything
customer_reviews.text: New washer is way deeper than my old front loader. With this bad boy I can easily reach everything!!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Merritt

customer_reviews.title: Use this most every day. Use it to reach ...
customer_reviews.text: Use this most every day. Use it to reach in a high cupboard and pick things up from the floor.
customer_reviews.author: skipper dale

customer_reviews.title: I absolutly love this. I even ordered one for a friend ...
customer_reviews.text: I absolutly love this. I even ordered one for a friend who has difficulty . Its very sturdy and can pick up anything even pennies.
customer_reviews.author: lisa d harris

customer_reviews.title: 2 broke in a year!
customer_reviews.text: Had 2 break in less than 6 months! Would not recommend this product. Works okay and then one second late just snaps and is unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Seher

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive reaching tool
customer_reviews.text: The tool works, but for an older person it is still hard to use.
customer_reviews.author: R B

customer_reviews.title: Shorter grabbers are more usefull
customer_reviews.text: The longer grabbers are too long for everyday use. I was pleased to see that a shorter grabber is available.
customer_reviews.author: D Richard

customer_reviews.title: useless
customer_reviews.text: the Jaws will not grip tight enough to even lift up a sweat sock
customer_reviews.author: ToddinOhio

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Arrived very quickly. Ideal length for our needs. Easy to operate and picks up even scraps from my shredder.
customer_reviews.author: LAWRENCE PRICE

customer_reviews.title: This is the best grabber I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: This is the best grabber I've ever used. It can pick up even the smallest things, such as bread crumbs.
customer_reviews.author: Helga McCann

customer_reviews.title: Not for heavy items!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to help me get wet last laundry out of my deep washer tub! Worked for a little while but after 1 too many heavy wet items, the wire cord snapped! Don’t think it was intended for this!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: perfect tool for arthritis
customer_reviews.text: this is the perfect tool for someone who has gripping problems and short enough to no require a lot of hand strength
customer_reviews.author: Frances Wilson

customer_reviews.title: This worksA!
customer_reviews.text: This multi-functional item is great for my elderly mother who just needs to reach to the back of the countertop. Easy to operate; solid grip.
customer_reviews.author: KDunn

customer_reviews.title: Great length
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing. Great length for s short person, use it to reach in my deep washer and dryer and many other places. Wish I had it sooner.
customer_reviews.author: CCG

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for shorter reaches. Inspires confidence. Feel good in hand. Great for getting cereal off shelf, picking up socks, and more. Nice weight.
customer_reviews.author: kelly wilkinson

customer_reviews.title: junk
customer_reviews.text: i have it a month and it has broken already..very disappointed.i have other ones that lasted a couple of years
customer_reviews.author: ro

customer_reviews.title: this is my second one!
customer_reviews.text: this is my second one! The first one was still good but I decided that I used it so much that I needed a second one.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Ginn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A wonderful tool, well made and works great, thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Taurus5945

customer_reviews.title: too short
customer_reviews.text: its great for people sitting down or in a wheelchair
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth

customer_reviews.title: Good size
customer_reviews.text: Just the right size to put by your chair to pick up those dropped items.
customer_reviews.author: Mona L. White

customer_reviews.title: I can't reach the bottom of my washing machine and this grabber is awesome.
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that I can grab the heavy items from the bottom of my washing machine with ease. I wanted to order one for my sister-in-law but was disappointed that it wasn't available.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Sayers

customer_reviews.title: Just as described
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to help remove compression wraps and it works very well!
customer_reviews.author: skw38

customer_reviews.title: Junk!
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality. It broke after the first week. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Raebel

customer_reviews.title: Almost as good as your fingers picking up small items (paper clip) from hardwood floor.
customer_reviews.text: Convenient size to pick up dropped items from a desk chair.
customer_reviews.author: D. W. Bilheimer

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: It is GREAT,I use it for picking up everything.Very good for kitchen cabinets and when your sitting to bend over to get something.👍😃
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Just as described. Good length to reach inside our washing machine.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: works great, use for reaching socks in the new top load large washing machine
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Great for that extra needed stretch
customer_reviews.text: I had a full hip replacement. Unable to do certain things while in recovery, I purchased this. That extra reach in the washer, dryer, (ceramic bowl for fun), and what ever else I'm not fully able to grab, is nice. Helps me out a lot in places my service dog can not get to. And she no longer has to get into the dryer to get the clothes in the back!! I'll be purchasing the long handled one!
customer_reviews.author: V. Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Good quality...works great.
customer_reviews.text: I have some regular length grabbers which I use a lot. However, there are times when I need one that is shorter and this fit that purpose perfectly. The quality is very good and I look forward to using it for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: S. Miller

customer_reviews.title: very handy
customer_reviews.text: I am short and have trouble reaching to the bottom our new washing machine. I bought this short grabber tool, it is great for reaching clothing at the bottom of our large washer.
customer_reviews.author: M. Smith

customer_reviews.title: The heavier the item to be lifted, the greater the amount of hand strength needed.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my diminutive bartender friend to aid her in reaching liquor bottles on high shelves. She tried to use it, but found that she did not have enough hand strength to keep the gripper tight enough to hold on to a full bottle. She nearly dropped it on her own head. If the gripper had a ratcheting mechanism that would lock tightly, I think the idea would have succeeded. If you know of a locking type of gripper, please let me know.
customer_reviews.author: noneedtoknow

customer_reviews.title: Love at first sight - first use.
customer_reviews.text: I live alone, am 73 with bad knees. This is my second grabber. I have a longer one for outdoor use. Wonderful. Especially in the Spring for picking up fallen branches before mowing. This one is more compact but exactly the right length for indoor use. Easy to use. strong, sturdy. I drop something on the floor, no problem. Can pick up small. thin things like an index card. I have a lot of house plants and dead, fallen leaves can be unsightly. No more. One of those "how did I live without it?" things.
customer_reviews.author: Gene A. Staver

customer_reviews.title: If you drop things a lot, this is the tool for you!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best. Its’s easy to squeeze. I love the design. The silicone ends prevent items from slipping off with minimal grip. I use it for throwing toys for my mini doxie, reaching into the dry bag of dog food to pick up small amounts of kibble for her. I used it all the time! I’m always dropping things, like: lids off my medicine bottles, pills that slip out of my hands and onto the floor, also to reach objects over my head. I have 4. One in the bathroom, kitchen, recliner and one outside.
customer_reviews.author: Fayetta Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My lifesaver for the past couple of weeks. I had back surgery and am unable to bend, lift, or twist for some weeks, and I live alone. I already had a couple of longer grabbers, but I have really liked these shorter ones. I have to feed my dogs on the floor and I can grab a dish with this gadget and place it on the floor with no problem by sitting on a low stool. Sometimes the 3' ones are just too long and get in the way.
customer_reviews.author: Marcy M.

customer_reviews.title: Love This Grabber
customer_reviews.text: I recently had a full hip replacement and cannot bend down to pick things up. I ordered one of these for when I came home from the hospital. I liked it so much I ordered a second one. I like the 19" length as it isn't too long to handle easily. I even picked up a quarter with it. On the second one I ordered the grabber claw wasn't positioned properly so I have to turn my hand a little. But, it still works just fine. I'd definitely recommend this for anyone who needs a little extra reach.
customer_reviews.author: PattiD

customer_reviews.title: Dads grabber
customer_reviews.text: My dad loves this thing but first one only lasted a year and cable broke. The second one cable broke in under 2 months. I can’t return under warranty because returns are blocked after a month. He is asking me to order third but ordered 3rd and 4th so hope they last. Vary good at grabbing anything off floor he drops but cable breaks with repeated use.
customer_reviews.author: Doug F.

customer_reviews.title: Getting the drinks in the back of that refrigerator can be difficult for someone with short arms like myself. This grabber works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: We have an ice cream truck and on the end of the large cold plate freezer, there is a refrigerator unit for drinks. Getting the drinks in the back of that refrigerator can be difficult for someone with short arms like myself. This grabber works perfectly! Its not too long so storage is easy in the small truck and the qualilty is superb! Love the rubberized end that grips just about anything - including a wet water bottle!
customer_reviews.author: Malia Moriarty

customer_reviews.title: Great for our new big washer!
customer_reviews.text: We just purchased a top load water efficient washer (type with no tall agitator in the middle). Love the washer, but my mother-in-law, who is an extremely kind woman who does most of our laundry is not too tall, which makes it very difficult to get small pieces of laundry out of this very deep tub washer. This grabber takes all the difficulty away. She loves it. Long enough to grab and soft enough to not scratch the tub.
customer_reviews.author: Tom D

customer_reviews.title: Great for seniors
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 86 yr old mother who recently suffered a back injury and cant bend over. She has several regular length grabbers but needed a shorter one to use when doing laundry and helping her get dressed. It works beautifully! It is lightweight and easy to saueeze. I will probably get her another so she can leave one in the laundry room.
customer_reviews.author: Missyj

customer_reviews.title: Boy is this thing useful!
customer_reviews.text: Boy is this thing useful! Just out of surgery & cannot bend or stretch. Easy squeeze grip. Flexible rubber grabber tip picks up even the smallest item off the floor. 19" is the perfect length if sitting and reaching down or over' perfect to grab something from a higher shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Robert W. Gilstein

customer_reviews.title: Why didn't I know about this sooner?
customer_reviews.text: I saw this at my daughter's house. A high shelf? No problem! I bought this as soon as I got home. Excellent! Top shelf in the medicine chest? High shelf in the kitchen? I really works. Really.
customer_reviews.author: ItalianDish

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my need, hopefully for yours!
customer_reviews.text: Chance has confined me permanently to a wheel chair, so I have to learn some new ways to do some things that in the past had quick easy ways to get done. This tool fits perfectly in a nook on my wheel chair, and is always available for extra reach, needed grab, and self confidence builder!
customer_reviews.author: Oldiebutgoodie

customer_reviews.title: Love it - it's so handy and useful.
customer_reviews.text: When I rec'd this grabber I thought it looked rather flimsy compared to my longer one. However, after using it for over 2 months, I love it. It is plenty sturdy and is easier to pick up close items than my longer grabber. Very glad I purchased it and gave it a chance.
customer_reviews.author: E.R.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for when you are seated
customer_reviews.text: While I am not in a wheelchair, I still have difficulty leaning down to pick something up from my desk or chair. I now have one at my office, one at my home office and one in the car. A great tool to make life easier. Small enough to be discrete.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Frequent Flyer

customer_reviews.title: Really nice short reacher
customer_reviews.text: It works very good but have to grip bottles or glasses as deep in the reacher as you can , as heavy things will slip out if you don't. It will pick up a pill from the floor too.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Mandel

customer_reviews.title: Broke, busted, cheap
customer_reviews.text: Broke instantly while trying to clean up a creek. Flimsy plastic.
customer_reviews.author: -JB

customer_reviews.title: Short and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This little grabber is slighter shorter than most (19") and is just perfect for use when I'm sitting down --- it's great for picking up errant balls of yarn or spools of thread from the floor when a longer unit would be just too long. The vinyl-covered mouth increases the grip strength, making it safe to pick up jars and other heavier objects.
customer_reviews.author: LoveToRead

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for after surgery or for those who are handicap
customer_reviews.text: Just what my mother needed after her surgery. This product is perfect for anyone who can't pick up anything heavy or even for the light weight things.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew K.

customer_reviews.title: Less strain on my neck and back
customer_reviews.text: I really like this gripper. I have some back issues and getting clothes out of the washer was a big challenge for me. Not anymore. I can also grab my water or cans in the cupboard easily. Sure has made my life easier.
customer_reviews.author: Denver52

customer_reviews.title: Perfect tool for short people
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect size pick up tool. Because I'm short I have a hard time pulling out items that are at the bottom of my top load washing machine. I can now pick up every item.
customer_reviews.author: Rudie B.

customer_reviews.title: Great for laundry use
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect size to reach into the washer and dryer to get those little things out.
customer_reviews.author: IP Beverly

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This 19 inch BirdRock grabber is the shortest 19 inch I have experienced. The grabbing length by my measure is 14 inches. That missing 5 inches would make it more useful.
customer_reviews.author: Frances

customer_reviews.title: Strong and Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: This reacher is wonderful! I ordered it half expecting the same old poorly made reachers I've had before but was surprised by the strength and quality of this one. I will be ordering more so that I can keep one in every room and also in my car.
customer_reviews.author: Cecelia Furman

customer_reviews.title: Not too long, not too short.
customer_reviews.text: Being very short this gripper is handy. The longer ones are too hard to maneuver for me, but this one is just perfect.
customer_reviews.author: kaylenmoore

customer_reviews.title: Love this compact grabber
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mother. She has a couple longer grabbers she uses all the time, but sometimes they are just to big and bulky. She loves her new short grabber. It is sturdy and very easy to use. Thank you, Sophie and Sam
customer_reviews.author: Wanda

product_meta.title: BirdRock Home Short Grabber Pick Up Tool - 19 Inch - Light Weight Aluminum Design - Reaching Aid - Articulating Rubber Head - Rubber Grip
product_meta.description: The BirdRock Home Short Grabber Tool is a great reaching aid making it easy to grab items in a variety of situations. The shorter grabber is lightweight making it easier to handle. Reach your favorite book, magazine or phone without having to leave the comfort of your chair. Easily store the tool when it’s not use. The reaching aid can also help in the laundry room grabbing stray pieces of laundry in the back of the dryer. Pick up trash from the ground without having to bend over. DIMENSIONS: 19" L x 4.5" H x 1" W. Weight: 6 ounces.
feature_bullets: RUBBER JAW: Rubber grabber jaw makes it easy to pick up hard to reach books, magazines, phones, papers, etc. Great reaching aid to reduce the strain on the back when bending and reaching for household items.

ROTATING GRABBER STYLE: Articulating rubber head pinchers turns 90 degrees allowing you to adjust the grabber based on the situation. Simply use the grabber both vertically or horizontally for ultimate versatility
PERFECT LENGTH & LIGHTWEIGHT DESIGN: Designed from lightweight aluminum and rubber crafted perfectly at a 19” length providing maximum reach without compromising on efficiency and comfort.
COMFORTABLE HANDLE: The handle of the reacher grabber is designed with contouring rubber padding that softly grips to the shape of your hand for optimum comfort, painless touch
DIMENSIONS: 19 x 4.5 x 1 Inches. Weight 5.2 ounces
